snippet: Merck agrees to buy Cubist in a deal valued at $9.5 billion. | A hedge fund keeps an S.E.C. inquiry quiet. | Big deals are back this year. | Deal makers regain their power on Wall Street.
abstract: Merck agrees to buy Cubist in a deal valued at $9.5 billion. | A hedge fund keeps an S.E.C. inquiry quiet. | Big deals are back this year. | Deal makers regain their power on Wall Street.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Merck Goes After Cubist
